general_advisory: Farmers are advised to take necessary precautions for the mentioned crops during the current weather conditions. Livestock, fishery, and poultry advice are also provided for the winter season.

advisory: In low temperature conditions, monitor for Aphid infestation and take appropriate measures.
To control downy mildew, spray recommended fungicides at the mentioned concentrations.
Monitor for Aphids and Thrips infestation, and use neem-based pesticide for control.
Chemical sprays like Thiamethoxam or Acetamiprid can be used for management.
Install light traps and use neem-based pesticide for Diamond Back Moth pests.
Recommended chemical sprays can also be used for pest management.
During cold hours, take measures to ensure livestock comfort and health.
Maintain water depth and adjust feeding rates according to temperature changes.
Avoid adding organic manures in the pond during winter.
Install heaters and use bulbs for heat maintenance in poultry sheds during winter.
Ensure necessary vaccinations are carried out timely.
